items.sentence: Tom didn\'t like being separated from his wife and children.
Tom didn\'t like school until he entered junior high school.
Tom didn\'t take the medication his doctor told him to take.
Tom didn\'t think it was likely that Mary was still at home.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to see his painting until it was done.
Tom was smart enough to realize that he shouldn\'t be there.
I haven\'t spoken with Tom since he got out of the hospital.
I could come right out and ask Tom what we all want to know.
French is one of the languages I\'ve always wanted to learn.
Have you ever wondered why we don\'t often see baby pigeons?
